projects.title: RoomConnect
projects.summary: Full stack application made in Typescript + Go for Miami students to find compatible students through dynamic queries and a real-time chat
projects.description:
This project was part of the INIT Build program for the Web Dev 3 group for the Fall '23 cohort. I was in charge of creating the general backend infrastructure, development and production environments, and the real-time chat using WebSockets and Redis.

I had a great time learning about all of the technologies as it was my first time working with them!
